directions.text: Pat steaks dry and cover in salt and pepper.
Place steaks in zip-top bags and seal tight while submerging to remove most air.
Cook for 1 to 3 hours, add more hot water if it drops below 133°.
Heat oil in a cast-iron skillet over high heat.
Cook steaks in skillet for 30 seconds, flip then cook for 1 minute while torching.
Flip again for another minute and torch the other side, then quickly cook the edges.
Let rest on a wire rack and rest for 5 minutes.
After the rest cook the shallot, garlic and herb for 30 seconds on high.
Pour the hot pan drippings over the steaks.
